name: Toprak Ejderi Yavrusu
desc:
A young vishap with a hard Geo exoskeleton.
Vishaps are exceptionally agile creatures that one would be wise not to underestimate in battle. Experts from Sumeru Academia believe that they become dragons when fully grown. By avoiding predators and natural disasters, perhaps they can even live long enough to become formidable beasts that reign over entire mountains.

dropMaterial.name: Kırılgan Kemik Parçası
dropMaterial.desc:
A bone shard once carried by a Geovishap.
Although they are quite fragile, they seem to still harbor some indescribable power.

dropMaterial.name: Sağlam Kemik Parçası
dropMaterial.desc:
A fragment of an unknown creature's bones that appear to be prized by Geovishaps for some reason.
The fragment appears to be quite aged. Despite being dragon-like beasts with no spoken language, they still seem to have some sort of special affection for these bone shards.

dropMaterial.name: Fosil Kemik Parçası
dropMaterial.desc:
A fossilized bone fragment sometimes found after defeating Geovishaps.
Geovishaps all dream of growing into great dragons one day. They see these fossils as dragon bones and greatly cherish them, perhaps because they too hope to attain the dragons' longevity and power.

value.text: A small and very nimble lizard hatchling. When its attacks are deflected by a character with a <color=#ffe14b>shield</color> , it seems to be paralyzed for a moment by the recoil...
